SignIn.title: Club Dashboard
SignIn.subtitle: Sign in as an admin to your club.
SignIn.tos_text_pre: By signing in, you agree to our
SignIn.tos: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
SignIn.layoutDescription: Manage your club's activities, members, and billing all in one place.

NotFound.message: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

Redirect.message: You are not allowed to access this page.

DeleteUserModal.title: Delete Member
DeleteUserModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete the member {name}? This action cannot be undone.

AddRiver.title: Add River to your Club
AddRiver.description: Select the drawing tool <drawTool></drawTool> and draw the river path on the map. After drawing, use the select tool <selectTool></selectTool> to click on the river and provide additional information. Only so, you can save the river!

AddLake.title: Add Lake to your Club
AddLake.description: Select the drawing tool <drawTool></drawTool> and draw the lake area on the map. After drawing, use the select tool <selectTool></selectTool> to click on the lake and provide additional information. Only so, you can save the lake!

AddZone.title: Add additional no-fishing Zone to your Club
AddZone.description: Select the drawing tool <drawTool></drawTool> and draw the no-fishing zone on the map. After drawing, use the select tool <selectTool></selectTool> to click on the zone and provide additional information. Only so, you can save the zone.

AddWaterModal.title: Add New Waterbody
AddWaterModal.subText: Set a name for the new waterbody and save it as a draft for your club. You need to edit it later to add more details.
AddWaterModal.name: Name
AddWaterModal.namePlaceholder: Enter the name of the waterbody
